entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
